Name: Archive Folder
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Automatically import a local or remote folder into Omeka as collections, items, files, and metadata.

Name: Archive Repertory
Author: Daniel Berthereau, Omeka S port by BibLibre
Description: Keeps original names of imported files and put them in a hierarchical structure (collection / item / files) in order to get readable urls for files and to avoid an overloading of the file server.

Name: Ark
Author: BibLibre
Description: Create short, unique, meaningless, universal and persistent identifiers (ark and/or noid) and use them as urls for records.

Name: Basket
Description: Allow user to add basket

Name: Clean Url
Author: Daniel Berthereau, Omeka S port by BibLibre
Description: Displays clean and readable URLs like http://example.com/my_collection/dc:identifier.

Name: COinS
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History and New Media (Omeka S port by BibLibre)
Description: Adds COinS metadata to item pages, making them Zotero readable.

Name: Collecting
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Add collecting forms to your sites.

Name: CSS Editor
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History and New Media
Description: Add public CSS styles through the admin interface.

Name: CSV Import
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Import content from a CSV file.

Name: Custom Vocab
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Describe your resources using vocabularies you create.

Name: Dspace Connector
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Connect Omeka S to DSpace repositories.

Name: Easy Install
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Plugin for installing plugins and themes from the web (https://github.com and https://gitlab.com).

Name: Fedora Connector
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Connect Omeka S to Fedora 4 repositories.

Name: File Sideload
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Add files that are already on your server to items.

Name: Guest User
Author: Biblibre
Description: Adds a guest user role. Can't access backend, but allows plugins to use an authenticated user

Name: IdRef
Author: BibLibre
Description: Add IdRef data type

Name: IIIF Server
Author: Daniel Berthereau, Omeka S port by BibLibre
Description: Integrates the IIIF specifications and a simple IIP Image Server to allow to process and share instantly images of any size and medias (pdf, audio, video, 3D...) in the desired formats.

Name: jQueryUI
Author: BibLibre
Description: Add jQueryUI

Name: Ldap
Author: Tim Hollies
Description: Authenticate Omeka-S users with LDAP

Name: Mapping
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Add location info to your items and sites.

Name: Metadata Browse
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Adds a link to same results for metadata values.

Name: OAI-PMH Repository
Author: BibLibre
Description: Exposes Omeka items as an OAI-PMH repository.

Name: Omeka 2 Importer
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Import content from an Omeka 2 site via its API.

Name: Omeka Twig
Author: Tim Hollies
Description: Use twig templates in Omeka-S themes

Name: PslSearchForm
Author: BibLibre
Description: PSL search form

Name: Rights Statements
Author: John Flatness

Name: Search
Author: BibLibre
Description: Add search capabilities to Omeka S

Name: Sharing
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Share and embed content on the web

Name: Solr
Author: BibLibre
Description: Add Solr search adapter

Name: unAPI
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Make your item metadata discoverable using unAPI.

Name: Universal Viewer
Author: Daniel Berthereau, Omeka S port by BibLibre
Description: Integrates the Universal Viewer in order to create carousels of virtual books from image files and to display any media file (pdf, audio, video...) in a unified player.

Name: Upgrade from Omeka Classic
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Add a compatibility layer to use Omeka Classic themes that were upgraded via the plugin Upgrade to Omeka Semantic.

Name: Value Suggest
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Describe your resources using auto-suggested values from controlled vocabulary services.

Name: Zotero Import
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History & New Media
Description: Import items and files from Zotero user and group libraries.
